com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SObjectUpdateListener


  • public interface SObjectUpdateListener
    The S-Canvas based listener interface for the SObject events.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSObjectChanged(SObject sObject, boolean byUndo, boolean byRedo)
      This handler is called when the SObject changes.
      void onSObjectClearAll(boolean bFreeMemory)
      This handler is called when deleting the list of objects (strokes, images, and text).
      void onSObjectDeleted(SObject sObject, boolean byUndo, boolean byRedo, boolean bFreeMemory)
      Deprecated. 
      void onSObjectDeleted(SObject sObject, boolean byUndo, boolean byRedo, boolean byChangeGroupState, boolean bFreeMemory)
      This handler is called when the SObject is deleted.
      void onSObjectInserted(SObject sObject, boolean byUndo, boolean byRedo)
      Deprecated. 
      void onSObjectInserted(SObject sObject, boolean byUndo, boolean byRedo, boolean byChangeGroupState)
      This handler is called when the SObject is inserted.
      void onSObjectSelected(SObject sObject, boolean bSelected)
      This handler is called when the SObject is selected or deselected.
      boolean onSObjectStrokeInserting(SObjectStroke sObjectStroke)
      This handler is called when the SObjectStroke is being inserted.

    • Method Detail

      • onSObjectInserted

        @Deprecated
void onSObjectInserted(SObject sObject,
                                boolean byUndo,
                                boolean byRedo)
        Deprecated. 
        This handler is called when the SObject is inserted.
        Parameters:
        sObject - SObject instance
        byUndo - Indicates the object is inserted by Undo
        byRedo - Indicates the object is inserted by Redo
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onSObjectInserted

        void onSObjectInserted(SObject sObject,
                     boolean byUndo,
                     boolean byRedo,
                     boolean byChangeGroupState)
        This handler is called when the SObject is inserted.
        Parameters:
        sObject - SObject instance.
        byUndo - Indicates the object is inserted by Undo.
        byRedo - Indicates the object is inserted by Redo.
        byChangeGroupState - Indicates the objects are grouped.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3

      • onSObjectDeleted

        @Deprecated
void onSObjectDeleted(SObject sObject,
                               boolean byUndo,
                               boolean byRedo,
                               boolean bFreeMemory)
        Deprecated. 
        This handler is called when the SObject is deleted.
        Parameters:
        sObject - SObject instance
        byUndo - Indicates the object is deleted by Undo
        byRedo - Indicates the object is deleted by Redo
        bFreeMemory - Indicates whether the object is deleted or not
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onSObjectDeleted

        void onSObjectDeleted(SObject sObject,
                    boolean byUndo,
                    boolean byRedo,
                    boolean byChangeGroupState,
                    boolean bFreeMemory)
        This handler is called when the SObject is deleted.
        Parameters:
        sObject - SObject instance.
        byUndo - Indicates the object is deleted by Undo.
        byRedo - Indicates the object is deleted by Redo.
        byChangeGroupState - Indicates the objects are grouped.
        bFreeMemory - Indicates whether the object is deleted or not.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3

      • onSObjectSelected

        void onSObjectSelected(SObject sObject,
                     boolean bSelected)
        This handler is called when the SObject is selected or deselected.
        Parameters:
        sObject - SObject instance
        bSelected - Indicates whether the object is selected or not
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onSObjectChanged

        void onSObjectChanged(SObject sObject,
                    boolean byUndo,
                    boolean byRedo)
        This handler is called when the SObject changes.
        Parameters:
        sObject - SObject instance
        byUndo - Indicates the object is changed by Undo
        byRedo - Indicates the object is changed by Redo
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onSObjectStrokeInserting

        boolean onSObjectStrokeInserting(SObjectStroke sObjectStroke)
        This handler is called when the SObjectStroke is being inserted. User can cancel the insertion of the storke by return value.
        Parameters:
        sObjectStroke - SObjectStroke instance
        Returns:
        true to cancel the insertion of the stroke, false to confirm the insertion.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onSObjectClearAll

        void onSObjectClearAll(boolean bFreeMemory)
        This handler is called when deleting the list of objects (strokes, images, and text).
        Parameters:
        bFreeMemory - Whether or not to delete the list from memory.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
